snippet: The oil rig count fell by 24 this week to 679 active rigs, the smallest drop since early April, after 31 and 26 rigs were shut down in the previous two weeks.
abstract: Baker Hughes reports oil rig count in latest week fell by 24 to 679 active rigs, after dropping 60 percent from June to March.
lead_paragraph: The oil rig count fell by 24 this week to 679 active rigs, the smallest drop since early April, after 31 and 26 rigs were shut down in the previous two weeks.

headline.main: Fewer Oil Rigs Are Shut This Week in the U.S.
headline.print_headline: Fewer Oil Rigs Are Shut This Week in the U.S.
